text: <@U4VR52RQE> has renamed the channel from "z-shared-17" to "dexter-and-aspen"
name: dexter-and-aspen

text:
Aspen, how are you doing? I've been assigned as your mentor :raised_hands: :smile:

Any questions you have let me know and I'll do my best to help you.

I see you're interested in computing. I'm working on the build of our Prospela web & app platforms. So hopefully I can shed some light on these areas for you!

It would be great to hear a bit about your interests and what you would like support with over the duration of this mentoring programme (approx. 2 months).
